name: Party Slots - Slot Machine With Spin The Wheel Bonus
name_original: Party Slots - Slot Machine With Spin The Wheel Bonus
description:
Party Slots, an amazing vegas style 5 reel slot machine which is easy to play with bonus features and more.

- Features up to 30 win lines
- Lots of themed game modes
- Daily big win bonus!
- Bonus games and bonus spins
- No internet required to play
- Facebook Connect - Sync with iPhone & iPad
- World high scores and Game Center integrations

We hope you enjoy playing!

For support questions please contact support@topgamekingdom.com or go to www.facebook.com/GoldCoinKingdom
